original_text: In those days Hezekiah was sick to the death, and prayed unto the Lord: and he spake unto him, and he gave him a sign.
korean_text: 그 때에 히스기야가 병들어 죽게 되었으므로 여호와께 기도하매 여호와께서 그에게 대답하시고 또 이적을 보이셨으나

sentences.original_text: In those days Hezekiah was sick to the death
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때 히스기야가 죽을 병에 들었으니

sentences.original_text: and he gave him a sign
